item.title: Notice Board
item.description: THIS IS A N
item.content:encoded:
THIS IS A NOTICE BOARD ğŸ‘€

2022-10-20

notice 1

Guys, I am rather busy lately so I will slacken my pace on updating essays and conctructing this blog.

I will be back as soon as I am free.

notice 2

As you can see, I have added a comment system to this blog. However itâ€™s still not finished and probably you can find some of bugs in it.

No worry, the bugs have nothing to do with your computer. I will finish it later.

item.title: First Blog
item.description: <h1 id="Hi-Everyone-Welcome-to-my-blog"><a href="#Hi-Everyone-Welcome-to-my-blog" class="headerlink" title="Hi, Everyone! Welcome to my blog
item.content:encoded:
Hi, Everyone! Welcome to my blog!

This blog is a test blog ğŸ“‚

Today is Oct 18th, 2022. 21 years ago I was borned and this is a gift I made for myself. Perhaps this blog is not as cool as others, however I am still very proud to give birth to my blog in such a short timeğŸ˜™. And meanwhile I really want to practice my English, my English sucksğŸ¤®.

I will modify this blog in the future, including the functions like log-in and local search system.ğŸ¤ 

By the way,ğŸ˜­ I want to go back to Tianjin, but I hate myself when I get lazy
